attributes.additional_details:
please help save the S.C.B.U in withybush hospital, Haverfordwest.

This is a vital unit within our community that has saved and helped many babies lives over the years!

You cant put a price on life

SAVE THE UNIT!!!

rejection.details: The provision of health services in Wales has been devolved to the Welsh Government and hence the Secretary of State for Wales is unable to intervene.
